entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: Mundungus looked nervously over his shoulder.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry watched them go, feeling slightly uneasy.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: It had just occurred to him that Mr. and Mrs. Weasley would want to know how Fred and George were financing their joke shop business

entities.name: mrs. weasley

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Would Mrs. Weasley still feel that Harry was as good as her son if she found out he had made it possible for Fred and George to start a career she thought quite unsuitable?

relationships.description: Giving the twins his Triwizard winnings had seemed a simple thing to do at the time
